text: This is a list of Belgian television related events from 1990. ==Events== ==Debuts== *2 September - Samson en Gert (1990–present) ==Television shows== ===1980s=== *Tik Tak (1981-1991) *VTM Soundmixshow (1989-1995, 1997-) ==Ending this year== ==Births== *1 December - Eva Daeleman, TV & radio host ==Deaths==
title: 1990 in Belgian television
